segments.text: Check the mirror . How do you like it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think the style is a little old-fashioned . It's not what I want .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think this one fits you . It's the new fashion style .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , yes . That's just the one I want . I will take it .
segments.speaker: S2
